hydra.compute

Class StatelessCoder<V1,V2>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hydra.compute.Coder<Unit,Unit,V1,V2>
      • hydra.compute.StatelessCoder<V1,V2>

  • public class StatelessCoder<V1,V2>
extends Coder<Unit,Unit,V1,V2>
    A convenience class for stateless coders; we use Hydra's Unit as the state type. Note: using Java's Void is problematic because of the interaction of Optional with null values.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class hydra.compute.Coder

        decode, encode, NAME

      static <V1,V2> StatelessCoder<V1,V2> unidirectional(java.util.function.Function<V1,Flow<Unit,V2>> encode)
      Construct a unidirectional coder; encoding follows the provided function, while decoding will fail gracefully.
